sense.gloss: to hold between (e.g. one's fingers, chopsticks), to grip (from both sides)
to put between, to sandwich between, to insert, to interpose
to catch (e.g. a finger in a door), to trap, to pinch
to insert (e.g. a break into proceedings), to interpose (e.g. an objection), to interject, to throw in (e.g. a joke)
to be on either side of (a road, table, etc.), to have between each other, to be across (a street, river, etc.)

sdata.j: ↑誰↑↓だれ↓かが↑話↑↓はな↓しているときに↑口↑↓くち↓を|↑挟↑↓はさ↓む|のは↑礼儀↑↓れいぎ↓↑正↑↓ただ↓しくない。
sdata.e: It is not polite to interrupt someone while he is talking.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑会話↑↓かいわ↓の↑最中↑↓さいちゅう↓に↑口↑↓くち↓を|↑挟↑↓はさ↓む|ことがよくある。
sdata.e: He often breaks into the middle of a conversation.

sdata.j: ・・・↑言↑↓い↓いたいことは↑色々↑↓いろいろ↓あるのだが、ここで↑口↑↓くち↓を|↑挟↑↓はさ↓む|のは↑野暮↑↓やぼ↓というもの。
sdata.e: There are things I'd like to say but to butt in now would be what they call uncouth.

sdata.j: トム、↑何↑↓なに↓も↑知↑↓し↓らないのに↑口↑↓くち↓を|↑挟↑↓はさ↓む|ものじゃありません。
sdata.e: Tom, you should stop cutting in when it's something you know nothing about.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓が↑口↑↓くち↓を|↑挟↑↓はさ↓む|ことではないのは↑分↑↓わ↓かってます。
sdata.e: I know this is none of my business.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓が↑口↑↓くち↓を|↑挟↑↓はさ↓む|ことではないのは↑分↑↓わ↓かってます。
sdata.e: I know it's none of my business.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓が↑口↑↓くち↓を|↑挟↑↓はさ↓む|ことではないのは↑分↑↓わ↓かってます。
sdata.e: I know that this is none of my business.
